name: typesafe-typescript-ast
description: this TypeScript AST is typesafe, instead of just 1 generic 'Node' type, there are hundreds of specific types

scripts.pubMin: npm run validatePublishReadiness && npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.pubPatch: npm run validatePublishReadiness && npm version patch && git push && npm publish
scripts.validatePublishReadiness: git diff --exit-code && ncu -u --packageFile package.json && npm install && npm run build

author: Corno
